> What is the distinction between setup() and the constructor?  

I'm not s=
ure if this is test runner specific behavior, but in my
experience the cons=
tructors are all called at the same time, before any
tests are run.  And th=
en setUp() is run immediately before each test
method is executed.  That's =
with JUnit 3.8.  I can't speak for version 4
as we haven't switched yet.
